thread.section_title: The Time New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent stay
thread.title_full: Excellent stay - Review of The Time New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mab333
title: Excellent stay
text: Great hotel with a perfect location. You are close enough to Times square without the noise and walking distance to everything else. The rooms are not to big but that's the way it is in NY. Everything was very clean. The room and the rest of the hotel was very modern. I would definitely stay at The Time again.
